descriptionHtml:
Creature Resouces for Modder.
[url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html]Development page[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6069]SE version[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Important[/size][/b]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[list]
[*][size=2]Do not send me permission request. Read  "Permissions and credits".[/size]
[/list]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4][b]Creature List[/b][/size]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 [b][size=3]DB[/size][/b]:Dragonborn, [b][size=3]DG[/size][/b]:Dawnguad, [b][size=3]HF[/size][/b]:Hearthfires
 [b][size=3]()[/size][/b]: Base Creature
 [size=3][b]* [/b][/size]: Require Addtional Credits

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4][b]Optional Files[/b][/size]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sample plugins of Creature Pack.

Dwarven Doll Followers
Add Five Dwarven dolls as followers.

Fantasia
Add creatures of this pack in DLC Area.

Hello Dagi
Add two Dagi Followers at Riverwood.

Specialized Weapon Collection
Add Giantsword, Rapier, Parrying dagger, Shotel in leveled list and craft list.
author: Vicn
